config.configDesc: (一部の変更を有効にするには、”変更を保存して再起動”を押す必要があります)
config.extremeGames: 成人用ゲームを表示する
config.extremeGamesDesc: 性的、暴力的、またはその他の不適切な要素を含むゲームを表示します。
config.enableEditing: カスタムを有効にする
config.enableEditingDesc: ゲーム、追加アプリケーション、プレイリストの編集を有効にし、'Curate'タブを表示します。
config.currentLanguageDesc: ランチャーで主に使用する言語
config.fallbackLanguageDesc: 設定言語の翻訳が未完成であった場合に使用する言語
config.flashpointPathDesc: Flashpointフォルダのパス (相対パスでよい)
config.redirectorDesc: ゲームのトラフィックをローカルサーバーに転送するために使用するソフトを選択できます。Linuxではどちらも使用されません。
config.nativePlatformsDesc: Use Native versions of these platforms. (If not available it will use Wine)
config.useCustomTitleBarDesc: Use a custom title bar at the top of this window.
config.themeDesc: File path of the theme to use (relative to the themes folder).
config.showDeveloperTab: 開発者タブを表示する
config.showDeveloperTabDesc: '開発者'タブを表示します。これはおそらく、開発者とキュレーターのみに役立ちます。
config.saveAndRestart: 変更を保存して再起動

home.updateAvailable: アップデートが利用可能
home.upToDate: 既に最新のバージョンです
home.downloadingUpdate: 更新プログラムをダウンロード中...
home.hallOfFameInfo: とびきり最高のものがお望みですか？: {0} をチェック！
home.allGamesInfo: ゲームをお探しですか？: {0}
home.allAnimations: 全てのアニメーション
home.configInfo: 何か変更したいことがありますか？: {0}
home.alreadyInstalled: 既にインストールされています
home.checkingUpgradeState: 更新状態を確認しています...
home.favoritesPlaylist: お気に入りプレイリスト
home.plannedFeatures: 計画中の機能をチェック！
home.notes: 問題が発生したら、まずはReadmeを読んでください。

app.hideRightSidebar: 右側のサイドバーを隠す
app.showRightSidebar: 右側のサイドバーを表示する
app.hideLeftSidebar: 左側のサイドバーを隠す
app.showLeftSidebar: 左側のサイドバーを表示する

developer.developerDesc: This is where all the useful developer tools will go.
developer.checkMissingImagesDesc: List all games without a thumbnail or screenshot
developer.checkGameIdsDesc: List all games with duplicate or invalid IDs
developer.checkGameTitlesDesc: List all games with duplicate titles on the same platform
developer.checkGameFieldsDesc: List all games with empty fields (of the fields that should not be empty)
developer.checkPlaylistsDesc: List all playlists with duplicate or invalid IDs, or that has game entries with missing, invalid or duplicate IDs
developer.checkGameFileLocationDesc: List all games with launch commands that can not be parsed into file paths (this is related to the 'Open File Location' function, not launching the game)
developer.checkMissingExecMappingsDesc: List all unique execs for win32, linux and darwin which are missing an exec mapping
developer.renameImagesTitleToIdDesc: Find all game images with the games title in their filename and rename them to use its ID instead
developer.renameImagesIdToTitleDesc: Find all game images with the games ID in their filename and rename them to use its title instead
developer.createMissingFoldersDesc: Find all missing folders in the Flashpoint folder structure and create them

about.flashpointDesc: The preservation project this launcher was built for, that aims to be an archive, museum and playable collection of web-based Internet games.
about.flashpointLauncherDesc: An open-source desktop application used to browse, manage and play games from the Flashpoint project.
about.licenseInfo: MIT (Read the file named 'LICENSE' for more information)

browse.noPlatform: プラットフォームなし
browse.dropImageHere: Drop an image here to add it
browse.noGameSelected: ゲームが選択されていません
browse.clickToSelectGame: Click on a game to select it.
browse.checkLogForInfo: Check the log for more information.
browse.noGamesFound: ゲームが見つかりません！
browse.dropGameOnLeft: Drop a game on this playlist in the {0} to add it.
browse.setFlashpointPathQuestion: Have you set the path to the {0} at the {1} page?
browse.noteSaveAndRestart: Note: You have to press {0} for the change to take effect.
browse.noGameMatchedDesc: 検索条件に一致するゲームはありません。
browse.noGameMatchedSearch: Try searching for something less restrictive.

curate.importAllDesc: Import all curations that are currently loaded
curate.deleteAllDesc: Delete all curations that are currently loaded
curate.openCurationsFolderDesc: Open the Curations folder in explorer
curate.openExportsFolderDesc: Open the default Exports folder containing your exported curations.
curate.openImportedFolderDesc: Open the default Imported curations folder containing your imported curations.
curate.newCurationDesc: Creates a new curation with a unique folder
curate.loadMetaDesc: Load one or more Curation meta files
curate.loadArchiveDesc: Load one or more Curation archives
curate.loadFolderDesc: Load one or more Curation folders
curate.heading: Heading
curate.deleteCurationDesc: Delete this curation (Files can not be recovered)
curate.noLaunchCommand: 'Launch Command' is a required field. Please fill it in before importing.
curate.invalidLaunchCommand: 'Launch Command' does not fit these URL requirements:
curate.releaseDateInvalid: 'Release Date' must follow YYYY-MM-DD (month and day are optional).
curate.unusedApplicationPath: 'Application Path' has an unused value. Make sure it's spelled correctly!
curate.unusedTags: The following tags are not present on any other game. Are they correct?
curate.unusedPlatform: 'Platform' has an unused value. Make sure it's spelled correctly!
curate.nonExistingLibrary: 'Library' is not the name of an existing library! (Default will be used)
curate.nonContentFolders: Non-Content folders found in Curation folder. Are they supposed to be there?
curate.ilc_nonExistant: Point to an existing file in your curation's 'content' folder.

playlist.saveDesc: 変更を保存し編集を終了する
playlist.discardDesc: Discard changes made and stop editing

misc.deleteAllBlankImages: Delete ALL {0} images for this game

dialog.phpNotFound:
PHP was not found on the path. Is it installed?
You may encounter unexpected and broken behaviour without it.
dialog.wineNotFound:
Wine is not installed, but is required to run this game.
Please see the Linux Support wiki article for details.
dialog.flashpointPathNotFound: The Flashpoint folder is not set or is invalid. Do you want to choose a folder to install to now?
dialog.selectFileToExportMeta: Select file to save meta to
dialog.selectFolderToExportMetaAndImages: Select folder to save meta and images to
dialog.exportedAlreadyExistsYesNo:
One or more of the exported files already exists.
 Do you want to replace them?
dialog.errorParsingPlatformsMessage:
{0} Error(s) raised while parsing platform XMLs
Please check the logs for details.
dialog.dataRequiredDesc:
You must install the Upgrade on the home screen before being able to use the launcher.

Do you wish to do this now?
dialog.verifyPathSelection: Future upgrades will also install here. Is this correct?
dialog.restartToApplyUpgrade:
This upgrade will not be applied until you restart.
Do you wish to do this now?

upgrades.infinityDesc: Required files. Adds support for Flash games.
upgrades.techDesc: Adds support for all other tech - Shockwave, Unity, Java, HTML5, etc.
upgrades.screenshotsDesc: Adds logos for Grid view and screenshots for all games.
